what: The Longitudinal Study of Australian Children data — LSACdata
title: The Longitudinal Study of Australian Children data — LSACdata
text: Simulated data based Longitudinal Study Australian Children containing 5,107 rows 10 columns missing values.

title: The Longitudinal Study of Australian Children data — LSACdata
The Longitudinal Study of Australian Children data — LSACdata
text: data frame containing following variables longitudinal cohort study. sep binary exposure variable fam_stress binary intermediate confounder parent_mh binary mediator preschool_att binary mediator child_mh binary outcome variable child_sex: binary baseline confounder child_atsi binary baseline confounder mat_cob binary baseline confounder mat_engl binary baseline confounder mat_age binary baseline confounder

title: Determine Family Type for GLM — family_type
Determine Family Type for GLM — family_type
Determine Family Type for GLM — family_type
text: data data frame containing variables analyzed. variable_names character vector variable names check. variable name correspond column data frame. unique_threshold integer value specifying minimum number unique values variable considered continuous. Default 10.

title: Determine Family Type for GLM — family_type
text: list element corresponds family type variables variable_names value either "binomial()" "gaussian()", indicating type family.

what: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect mapped to a target trial — medRCT.fun
title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect mapped to a target trial — medRCT.fun
text: Causal mediation analysis estimating interventional effect mapped target trial

title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect mapped to a target trial — medRCT.fun
code: medRCT.fun(   dat,   ind = 1:nrow(dat),   first = first,   K = K,   fam_type = fam_type,   interactions_XC = interactions_XC,   intervention_type = intervention_type,   mcsim )

title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect mapped to a target trial — medRCT.fun
text: dat data.frame data analysis ind vector indices define sample dat conduct analysis. Defaults rows data. facilitates use function within boot() function boot package first index first mediator interest combining intermediate confounders mediators K number mediators fam_type family type mediators interactions_XC character string specifying exposure-confounder confounder-confounder interaction terms include regression models procedure. Defaults include two-way exposure-confounder interactions confounder-confounder interactions. intervention_type character string indicating type interventional effect estimated. Can '', 'shift_all', 'shift_k', 'shift_k_order'. Default ''. mcsim number Monte Carlo simulations conduct

what: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect — medRCT
title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect — medRCT
text: 'medRCT' used estimating interventional effects defined mapping target trial. can handle multiple mediators, including primary interest intermediate confounders

title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect — medRCT
code: medRCT(   dat,   exposure,   outcome,   mediators,   intermediate_confs,   confounders,   interactions_XC = "all",   intervention_type = c("all", "shift_all", "shift_k", "shift_k_order"),   mcsim,   bootstrap = TRUE,   boot_args = list(R = 100, stype = "i", ci.type = "norm"),   ... )

title: Causal mediation analysis for estimating the interventional effect — medRCT
text: dat data.frame data analysis exposure character string representing name exposure variable data. exposure variable must binary, 1 indicating exposed treated, 0 indicating unexposed control. outcome character string representing name outcome variable data. outcome variable must binary. mediators character vector representing names mediators data. mediators must binary variables. intermediate_confs character vector representing names intermediate confounders data. intermediate confounders must binary variables. confounders character vector representing names confounders data, must required class (e.g. factor appropriate) interactions_XC character string specifying exposure-confounder confounder-confounder interaction terms include regression models procedure. Default '', includes two-way exposure-confounder interactions excludes confounder-confounder interactions. intervention_type character string indicating type interventional effect estimated. Can '', 'shift_all', 'shift_k', 'shift_k_order'. Default '', effects estimated. ‘shift ’ estimate interventional effect shifting joint distribution mediatios. ‘shift k’ estimate interventional effect shifting distribution mediator k, independently mediators. ‘shift_k_order’ estimate interventional effect shifting distribution mediator k, independently antecedent mediators, allowing flow effect mediator k descendent mediators. mcsim number Monte Carlo simulations conduct bootstrap logical. TRUE, bootstrap conducted. boot_args list bootstrapping arguments. R number bootstrap replicates. stype indicates second argument statistics boot function represents ... arguments passed boot function boot package.
